post.description: Endpoint for Mentor to set schedule and meeting link

get.description: Get all mentoring sessions for the authenticated user (as mentor or member)
Get need assessment for a mentoring session

current_situation.example: 3rd year CS student struggling with career direction

goals.example: Become a software engineer at top tech company

message.example: Hanya student yang dapat mengupdate assessment

post.description: Create need assessment for a mentoring session (Student only)

current_situation.example: 3rd year CS student struggling with career direction

goals.example: Become a software engineer at top tech company

400.description: Assessment already exists or bad request

message.example: Assessment sudah ada untuk sesi ini
Hanya student yang dapat membuat assessment

items.example: The form data field is required.

403.description: Forbidden - Not authorized to delete this assessment

message.example: Anda tidak memiliki akses untuk menghapus assessment ini

put.description: Mark need assessment as completed (Mentor only)

403.description: Only mentors can mark as completed

message.example: Hanya mentor yang dapat menandai assessment sebagai selesai
